lead_paragraph: This is the story of the relationship between Dirk Nowitzki - 13 time All-Star, League MVP, Finals MVP and NBA Superstar - and his personal coach and mentor Holger Geschwindner. Holger, the German basketball legend and scientist, recognized Nowitzki's talent early on and helped the athlete invent a perfect jump shot. Exclusive footage and interviews with Nowitzki, Kobe Bryant, Yao Ming, Steve Nash, Michael Finley, Jason Kidd, Rick Carlisle, Mark Cuban, David Stern, Don Nelson and former German Chancellor Helmut Schmidt delve into the story of Nowitzki's success, from second league German basketball to one of the top athletes of the NBA.
